summary: The Reducing Regulatory Burdens Act of 2025 aims to amend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act (FIFRA) and the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (Clean Water Act) to clarify congressional intent regarding pesticide regulation in navigable waters. It seeks to limit permit requirements under the Clean Water Act for pesticide discharges, with exceptions for violations of FIFRA or specific types of discharges like industrial effluent. The bill effectively reduces regulatory oversight of pesticide application.
